markdownRemark.excerpt: Alḥamdulillāh, through Allāh’s grace and mercy, we’ve finished the construction in the muṣallá areas just in time for Ramaḍān. Please join us for Iftar and…
markdownRemark.html: Alḥamdulillāh, through Allāh’s grace and mercy, we’ve finished the construction in the muṣallá areas just in time for Ramaḍān. Please join us for Iftar and Tarawīḥ each night during Ramaḍān.
